actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Placer County, Calif. to Mrs. Edna C Marshall, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey a certain tract of land in California to a certain person, provided that the individual makes application and pays the fair market value for that land.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Placer County, Calif. to Mrs. Edna C Marshall, and for other purposes.
